  • Constructor Details

    • ContentDAO

      public ContentDAO()
      Constructor for the ContentDAO class. Initializes the database connection using a singleton approach provided by the SqliteConnection class. Additionally, it creates the necessary database tables ("material", "lesson", and "worksheet") if they do not already exist. If the connection establishment process fails, this constructor throws a RuntimeException with the relevant SQLException details. The database file used by this connection is "Tail.db", and it is assumed to reside in the application's working directory. Modify the JDBC URL if required to match your configuration.

  • Method Details

    • addMaterial

      public int addMaterial(String materialType)
      Adds an entry to the material table and retrieves the auto-generated ID. Required for adding to child tables.
      Parameters:
      materialType - The type of material to be added.
      Returns:
      The auto-generated materialID, or -1 if the operation fails.

    • addContent

      public int addContent(Material content, String tableName)
      Adds a new worksheet entry to the database, including its attributes. Assumes the materialID is not already set, and generates a new materialID by adding an entry to the material table.
      Specified by:
      addContent in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      content - The content object (Material) containing the details to be added, including topic, content, teacher ID, classroom ID.
      tableName - The name of the database table to insert the data ("lesson", "worksheet", or "learningCard").
      Returns:
      The material ID of the newly added content if the operation is successful. Returns -1 if an error occurs.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the database connection is inactive or if adding a material entry fails.

    • addLearningCardToDB

      public int addLearningCardToDB(LearningCardCreator content)

    • setContent

      public boolean setContent(int materialID, String newContent)
      Updates the content of the specified material in the database, based on the given material ID. This method accepts either worksheets or lessons and executes the appropriate update query.
      Specified by:
      setContent in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the existing material to be updated. Must already exist as "worksheet" or "lesson".
      newContent - The new content to be set for the specified material.
      Returns:
      true if the content was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • setContent

      public boolean setContent(int materialID, String newContent, String newTopic)
      Updates the content and topic of a material in the database based on the provided material ID. This method distinguishes between lessons and worksheets and performs the update operation accordingly.
      Specified by:
      setContent in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material to be updated.
      newContent - The new content to set for the specified material.
      newTopic - The new topic to set for the specified material.
      Returns:
      true if the update operation is successful; false otherwise.

    • updateClassroomID

      public boolean updateClassroomID(int classroomID, int materialID)
      Updates the ClassroomID for a specific material in the database identified by its materialID.
      Specified by:
      updateClassroomID in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      classroomID - The new ClassroomID to be set for the specified material.
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material whose ClassroomID is to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the ClassroomID was successfully updated; false if the operation fails or an SQLException is encountered.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the database connection is not active.

    • updateWeek

      public boolean updateWeek(int week, int materialID)
      Updates the "week" field of a material in the database based on the provided material ID.
      Specified by:
      updateWeek in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      week - The new week value to set for the specified material.
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material whose week value is to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the "week" field was successfully updated; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the database connection is not active.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Specified by:
      getWorksheetContent in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material (worksheet) to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Worksheet object containing all attributes if found; otherwise, returns null if no worksheet is found or an error occurs.

      Specified by:
      getMaterialType in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Material object containing the material type and ID, or null if no material is found for the given ID or an error occurs.

    • getWeek

      Specified by:
      getWeek in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material whose week value is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The week value associated with the specified material ID, or -1 if an error occurs or no record is found.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the classroom ID if found in the database, or -1 if no matching record is found or an error occurs

    • getTeacherID

      Specified by:
      getTeacherID in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getClassroomList

      public List<Integer> getClassroomList(String teacherEmail)
      Retrieves a list of classroom IDs associated with the given teacher's email.
      Specified by:
      getClassroomList in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      teacherEmail - the email address of the teacher whose classrooms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the classroom IDs associated with the teacher

    • getMaterialByWeekAndClassroom

      public int getMaterialByWeekAndClassroom(int weekNumber, String type, int classroomID)
      Retrieves the ID of the material associated with the specified week number and material type.
      Specified by:
      getMaterialByWeekAndClassroom in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      weekNumber - the week number for which the material is requested
      type - the type of material to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the ID of the material if found; returns -1 if no material is found or an error occurs

    • fetchContentTableData

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<ContentTableData> fetchContentTableData(String teacherEmail)
      Fetches content table data for the classrooms associated with a given teacher's email. The method retrieves materials from the database and populates an observable list with data for each material, including week, topic, type, classroom ID, material ID, and last modified date.
      Specified by:
      fetchContentTableData in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      teacherEmail - The email address of the teacher whose classroom materials are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing ContentTableData objects representing the material details for the teacher's classrooms.

    • deleteContent

      public boolean deleteContent(int materialID)
      Deletes the content associated with a specified material ID from the database. This method identifies the material type (lesson or worksheet) and performs the necessary deletions in the corresponding table before removing the material record.
      Specified by:
      deleteContent in interface IContentDAO
      Parameters:
      materialID - The unique identifier of the material to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the material and its associated content were successfully deleted; false otherwise.

    • getLearningCardContent

      public String getLearningCardContent(int learningCardID)
      Gets the contents of a stored learning card by its ID
      Parameters:
      learningCardID - ID of the learning card
      Returns:
      String containing learning card content as it is stored in the database

    • getAllCards

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<LearningCardCreator> getAllCards()
      Retrieves all cards from the card table of the database and returns them in a comboBox readable format
      Returns:
      ObservableList of all IDs and topics of learning cards
